I just found a solution to it the problem:


go here:
http://duke3d.m-klein.com/

scroll down and download version 19.7.1. When you're done with that, put all the files into your DUKE NUKEM 3D ATOMIC folder. Let them overwrite any files in that folder (don't worry, your controls won't get fu*ked up). Let them replace any file in there and all should be well.
I'd like to thank sleepburn for uploading this great game, and EAB for finding a fix to the saving and loading bug :]
